description: Sample phenotype ontology records from Human Phenotype Ontology

records.label: Seizure
records.definition: A seizure is an episode of abnormal electrical activity in the brain.
records.comment: The term 'seizure' is used for this feature to distinguish it from epilepsy.

records.label: Global developmental delay
records.definition: A delay in the achievement of motor or mental milestones in the domains of development of a child.

records.label: Hypertelorism
records.definition: Interpupillary distance more than 2 SD above the mean.

records.label: Atrial septal defect
records.definition: A defect in the interatrial septum allowing communication between the left and right atria.
